scripts.deploy:local: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-full.ts --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-and-update.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:hardhat: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-full.ts --network hardhatMainnet && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-and-update.ts --network hardhatMainnet
scripts.deploy:local:no-anonymous: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-localhost-no-anonymous.ts --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-and-update.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:reset: npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-full.ts --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-and-update.ts --network localhost
